	  <div class="mainpop-heading">Notice Against Employment Fraud / Unfair Practice</div>
	  <p>It has come to our notice that certain individuals / groups of individuals / institutions have been fraudulently offering false employment opportunities on behalf of National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC) and Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana(PMKVY), flagship scheme of Ministry of Skill Development and Entrpreneurship . These individuals / institutions have been sending out fake employment call letters / offers and other bogus recruitment material using the National Skill Development Corporation’s name and logo of PMKVY to defraud job seekers.</p>
	  <p>False letterheads and E-mail id’s may have been created using NSDC logo/office address. Job seekers could be duped of money as these fake recruiters ask candidates to deposit a sum of amount/draft /cheque in their fake bank accounts, to receive an offer letter from the Corporation.</p>
	  <p>We hereby declare that all such statements and representations made in such correspondence are not made on behalf of or with any authorization from NSDC Office, New Delhi.</p>
	  <p>Employment to any candidate without a direct contact by the HR Department NSDC, followed by a formal recruitment process to include a personal interaction session, would be considered an attempt of fraud.</p>
	  <p>National Skill Development Corporation in its mandate for Transforming the Skill landscape of India, does not demand any money from individuals for providing training/ assessment or certification in various job roles/ courses under PMKVY.</p>
	  <p>Issued by National Skill Development Corporation, for the awareness and to safeguard the interest of all aspirants/applicants.
</p>

              <h3>Who We Are</h3>
